author: Joshua Nelson
title: Defense Secretary Esper calls out China for continuing to withhold coronavirus data
description: Secretary of Defense Mark Esper said on Wednesday that China could have been more “transparent” early on, which would have helped develop a “better understanding of the virus."
content:
